earthstone@crystalcave.name: earthstone
earthstone@crystalcave.examine: Soothing to the touch, this stone fits perfectly into the palm of your hand.
earthstone@crystalcave.desc[0]: A dull &+ybrown&N stone lies forgotten here.

torn_papyrus@crystalcave.name: torn_papyrus
torn_papyrus@crystalcave.examine:
It reads:
        'No escape... the curse will follow... a stone forged from the earth...
long lost and hidden...  Lost in the swamp lurks the scurge of the seven seas 
... a ring made of a feather... beyond a great rock... off the river bank of
Styx...'  
It is too torn and battered to make out the rest.
torn_papyrus@crystalcave.desc[0]: A torn, tattered piece of &+Wpapyrus&N has been dropped here.

knapsack@crystalcave.name: knapsack
knapsack@crystalcave.examine:
Made of heavy, durable canvas, this knapsack should hold plenty of items 
during your travels.
knapsack@crystalcave.desc[0]: A battered, but serviceable knapsack lies here.

windstone@crystalcave.name: windstone
windstone@crystalcave.examine: Crackling with &+Renergy&N, this stone seems to be engulfed in magic.
windstone@crystalcave.desc[0]: A glowing &+Wwhite&N stone has been dropped here.

seastone@crystalcave.name: seastone
seastone@crystalcave.examine:
Endless waves can be seen in the center of the stone, deep, fierce and 
soothing.
seastone@crystalcave.desc[0]:
A stone the color of the &+bsea&N has been carelessly dropped 
here.

journal@crystalcave.name: journal
journal@crystalcave.examine:
Opening the book, you realize that this is the private journal of the famed 
archaeologist, Dr Phinas Pilsner who disappeared log ago.  It reads:

         'Finally, I've found the way to defeat the high priestess, Neferteri.
The secret lies in harnessing the four elements, Earth, Wind, Fire and Water.
Hidden vast distances apart in the land, I've discovered the possible 
locations of two of the stones.  One is said to lie protected deep in the 
heart of the crystal caves.  The other is in the hands of a moor who traveled
far to the east in search of a great wizard to help unlock the power of the
stone and is reported to be lost in the caves west of Camelot.
     But alas, my search has ended in failure.  Neferteri's curse has finally
caught up with me.  Only now as my sight slowly fades, do I realize there 
might be a fifth stone hidden that is the key to Neferteri's power.'
journal@crystalcave.desc[0]: A tattered-looking, leather bound journal lies here.

opalshield@crystalcave.name: opalshield
opalshield@crystalcave.examine: Part of a set, a gift to a long-dead King, this shield will serve you well.
opalshield@crystalcave.desc[0]: A &+cshield&N decorated with semi-precious jewels lies here.

bleached_papyrus@crystalcave.name: bleached_papyrus
bleached_papyrus@crystalcave.examine:
Only by obtaining the Soul of Neferteri will one be able to break the curse.  
Yet always crafty, she has chosen the most powerful of servants to guard it.  
It is whispered that by gathering the four which hold the key to Neferteri's 
power, is it possible to defeat the invincible son of Isis.  Take care on the 
journey across the sea of sand for she had hidden her tomb well.
bleached_papyrus@crystalcave.desc[0]: A bleached, brittle piece of &+Wpapyrus&N lies ignored here.

sunstone@crystalcave.name: sunstone
sunstone@crystalcave.examine:
Glowing with a star burst pattern of red and orange, this stone seems to 
have mystically captured the fire of the sun.
sunstone@crystalcave.desc[0]: A deep &+rred&N stone the color of &+rfire&N lies here.

brandy@crystalcave.name: brandy
brandy@crystalcave.examine: A deep amber in color, this fine brandy is surely a drink for the gods.
brandy@crystalcave.desc[0]: A dusty bottle of Napoleon brandy has been discarded here.

stained_papyrus@crystalcave.name: stained_papyrus
stained_papyrus@crystalcave.examine:
A stone that holds the power of the sun was carried by a reckless adventurer 
to a castle in the west.  Believing he had the courage to beat the evil under
the castle, the poor man lost his way in an abandoned town -- only to meet up 
with the mythical fire-breathing creature.  Beware ...
stained_papyrus@crystalcave.desc[0]: A scrap of &+Wpapyrus&N lies hidden in the corner.

crystalcave11@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave11@crystalcave.description:
&+BWater&N spills down the west wall reflecting the &+Wlight&N making
it seem like liquid &+Wcrystal&N.  Mosses cling to the walls, giving off a 
decidedly &+ggreen&N tint.  Steam rises from the &+Bpool&N of &+Bwater&N just 
inches from your feet.  You wish you could stand under the falls and wash all 
your troubles away.  Looking over your shoulder, you heave a weary sigh, not 
wishing to find your way back through the seemingly endless &+Wcrystal&N 
passages.

crystalcave7@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave7@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

crystalcave6@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave6@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

crystalcave2@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave2@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

crystalcave5@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave5@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

crystalcave3@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave3@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

crystalcave4@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave4@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

crystalcave8@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Cave&N
crystalcave8@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

crystalcave10@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave10@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

crystalcave1@crystalcave.title: Entrance to the &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave1@crystalcave.description:
Blinded by an &+Wintense&N light, it takes a few moments for your eyes
to adjust.  You gasp in awe when you realize the cave walls are made up of 
hundreds of crystalline formations.  The floor is littered with glittering 
shards of &+Wcrystals&N that have somehow broken away from the walls.  Peering
up at the ceiling, you can find no discernible light source that displays all
this natural beauty.

crystalcave12@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Grotto&N
crystalcave12@crystalcave.description:
Stepping inside, you see a large grotto formed entirely out of glowing
&+Wcrystals&N. Light pouring in from an unseen source reflects off the 
&+Wcrystals&N, dazzling you with a &+Rbrilliant&N display of color.  Disturbed
by your presence, dozens of multi-colored &+rfire lizards&N take flight.  The
music of those delicate, gossamer wings sounds like the sighing of the wind, 
can barely be heard over the sound of the rushing &+bwater&N. 
        On a low, narrow ledge, a statue of a sphinx rests.  The ageless eyes 
seem able to look straight into your very soul and see your secrets.  A rounded
stone the color of the &+bsea&N rests between its claws.
        Looking closer, you see the ripple of muscles and realize this is no 
statue, but something quite alive.

crystalcave9@crystalcave.title: &+CCrystal Caves&N
crystalcave9@crystalcave.description:
The glittering &+Wcrystals&N only serve to confuse you, making one 
branch look like another.  Are you really getting anywhere?  Or are you 
traveling around in circles?

willie@crystalcave.name: willie
willie@crystalcave.examine:
With a patch over one eye and a death's head grin, do you really want to 
tangle with this fellow?
willie@crystalcave.description: One Eyed Willie, the scourge of the seven seas lurks here.

moor@crystalcave.name: moor
moor@crystalcave.description: A moor searching for a great wizard eyes you suspiciously.

sphinx@crystalcave.name: sphinx
sphinx@crystalcave.examine:
Noble and proud, this sphinx posseses a secret smile and ageless eyes.
Yet with skin so smooth, you are tempted to pet him.
sphinx@crystalcave.description: An intricately carved statue of a sphinx sits here.

archaeologist@crystalcave.name: archaeologist
archaeologist@crystalcave.examine: Gaunt and gray, not even a miracle worker could help this man.
archaeologist@crystalcave.description:
A sight-less man in ragged clothes sits here, his face 
reflecting that all hope is lost.

chimera@crystalcave.name: Chimera
chimera@crystalcave.examine: She wonders whether or not you taste like chicken.
chimera@crystalcave.description: A mighty Chimera eyes you hungrily.

burrower@crystalcave.name: burrower
burrower@crystalcave.examine: Cute and furry, this animal is tempting to hold.
burrower@crystalcave.description: A cute, furry ball of &+Wfluff&N rolls aimlessly here.

tunnelrat@crystalcave.name: tunnelrat
tunnelrat@crystalcave.examine: It's a rat, what did you expect?
tunnelrat@crystalcave.description: A large, ugly rat with &+Lblack&N, beady eyes is crouched here.

asp@crystalcave.name: asp
asp@crystalcave.examine: Sometimes, it's not easy being green.
